translation.ko: 약속한 대로 내가 기다리고 있다고 전해줄래?

translation.en: Guys? Guys?
Yeah, okay. Okay, I am a person!
-That was awesome, by the way. -Had to. Had to.
translation.ko: - 정말 끝내줬어 - 어쩔 수 없어서 그런 거야

translation.en: Yeah, you had to.
-He let you off the hook, didn't he? -He did, he did, but I had to go with it.
translation.ko: 카바노가 구제해 준 거지? 그래, 시키는 대로 할 수밖에 없었다고

translation.en: I can't believe it!
We hit the moron jackpot!
Everybody who needs a beating, conveniently together on one lawn.
translation.ko: 손 좀 봐줘야 할 인물들이 편리하게 한 데 모여있네

translation.en: -Who are they? -Brunson University frat guys.
God, I hate white people.
Excuse me, why are you here? What's the matter?
translation.ko: 여긴 어떻게 온 거죠? 무슨 일이에요?

translation.en: I tell you what is the matter.
These old townies trashed our frat house!
translation.ko: 저 노땅들이 우리 동아리 집을 엉망으로 만들었다고요

translation.en: And nobody treats our good-times headquarters with disrespect!
translation.ko: 아무도 우리 아지트에 모욕을 주고 빠져나갈 순 없다고!

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yeah!
They didn't do it.
Me do it.
Don't try and cover for him, Z-Dog!
-Who's Z-Dog? -We know they're trying to get back at us...
...for making them do the naked plunge in our swimming hole.
Your swimming hole? I've been swimming at the quarry since I was 8 years old.
translation.ko: 너희 웅덩이라고? 채석장에서 수영한 게 내가 8살 때부터라고

translation.en: Apparently, everybody in this crap town...
...has been swimming there since they were 8 years old.
I guess nobody wants to leave this dump because they're too busy sucking!
translation.ko: 아무도 이 쓰레기 마을을 못 뜨는 거네 후진 삶 사느라 바쁘셔서 말이야!

translation.en: We'll finish later.
-You promise? -I promise.
-Okay. -Hey, smart guy!
Lenny Feder left this town, moved to Hollywood, made big bucks...
translation.ko: 레니 페이더는 이 마을을 떴다네 할리우드에 가서 돈 엄청 벌었다고

translation.en: ...probably more money than all you brainiacs put together ever will.
translation.ko: 아마 네놈들 다 합쳐서 평생 버는 것보다 훨씬 많이 벌었을걸

translation.en: But guess what? He came back here.
translation.ko: 그래도 어떤지 알아? 레니는 이곳으로 돌아왔다

translation.en: Because this beautiful town is his home, and it always will be his home.
translation.ko: 이 아름다운 마을이 고향이니까 영원히 고향일 테니까

translation.en: Well, that was just a moving testament to this community, bro!
But we didn't come here to hear any lame speeches.
translation.ko: 하지만 우린 같잖은 설교 듣자고 온 게 아니거든요

translation.en: We came here to kick some old, smelly ass!
translation.ko: 노땅들 냄새나는 엉덩이 걷어차 주려고 온 거라고!

translation.en: Fellas, we may be old.
We may be smelly.
We may have a penis.
But the only ones getting their ass kicked around here...
...is gonna be you spoiled...
...privileged, uppity, preppy D-bags.
You hear that?
Now, let's get busy!
Come on, son! You ain't tough!
Hit him! Yeah, Braden! Yeah! Damn!
You want this?
Sir, please stop it!
That's not a sir! That's a woman!
My woman!
Come on, babe.
Oh, you're so hot.
translation.ko: 당신은 할 수 있어요 끝내주게 섹시하네

translation.en: No! Don't bust my face!
You saved me.
I will protect you for the rest of your life.
translation.ko: 네 남은 평생 널 보호해 주겠어

translation.en: Okay, blow-dryer boy.
Oh, God, no!
No! No!
Yeah! Yeah!
Having a good anniversary, babe?
Honey, the best.
I can't breathe. Choking me!
translation.ko: 숨을 못 쉬겠어 목 졸리고 있어!

translation.en: Yeah!
-We did it. We did it, man. -Yeah.
We make a good team.
Yeah. Yeah, that was fun.
Boomer. What's going on?
This!
You're a traitor, Boomer!
His name's not Boomer!
It's Gary.
It's Greg.
Oh. Greg.
Oh, my God! Did you see his head? He's got a-- He's bald!
I got a wild one! I got a wild one!
translation.ko: 산 채로 잡았다! 산 채로 잡았어!

translation.en: Noogie, noogie, noogie.
Nobody noogies my brother!
translation.ko: 우리 형한테 까불다니 용서할 수 없어!

translation.en: My brain! My brain!
BU!
Hey, man, I had that one.
I know you did, big brother.
-Get out of here! -Don't hit me!
Hey, hey, look who showed up.
Flippy-boy. Yeah, you want to flip your way out of this?
translation.ko: 텀블링 보이 여기서도 텀블링해서 빠져나가 보시지

translation.en: Too slow, old man. Where you work out, Cinnabon?
Look who's back up, baby.
I didn't know we were kicking. Give me a second to stretch.
translation.ko: 발도 쓰는 건지 몰랐네 잠깐 스트레칭 좀 하자

translation.en: All right.
We're gonna throw some legs, huh? You want to throw some legs, huh?
translation.ko: 발도 쓴다 이거지? 어디 마음껏 차보시지?

translation.en: That just happened.
What, were you raised by ninjas?
Congratulations.
You won the fight. Here's your prize.
Thanks, little girl. It looks just like you.
It's a monkey! Look at me.
I'm a stupid little monkey.
Good night.
Come on, guys! We got to get out!
Let's go!
Lenny! Baby.
-Baby, are you all right? -I'm coming for you, Leonard!
I'm here for you, Leonard. I'm here for you.
translation.ko: 내가 왔어, 레오나드 당신을 위해 내가 왔어

translation.en: Who--? Who are you?
It's your pretty, shiny Penny.
Oops, sorry, I kicked your barrette.
Sorry, honey.
You guys were Fuji and Tanaka out there.
This is just like high school.
Get drunk, get in a fight, wind up back at Lamonsoff's, eating eggs.
translation.ko: 취하고 싸우고 라몬소프네 와서 달걀 먹고

translation.en: Except for the drunk part, Mommy.
All you guys together brings back so many memories.
translation.ko: 너희 모두 같이 있는 걸 보니까 추억이 많이 떠오르는구나

translation.en: -Dickie, is this you and Lenny? -Let's see.
translation.ko: - 딕키, 이게 너랑 레니야? - 어디 보자

translation.en: Yeah, me and Hollywood were best friends in kindergarten.
translation.ko: 그래, 나랑 할리우드는 유치원 때 절친이었지

translation.en: -Yep. -What happened?
What do you mean, "What happened?" We were in different classes.
translation.ko: 뭐가 '어떻게 된 건데' 야? 반이 달라졌지 자연스레 멀어진 거고, 그렇지?

translation.en: -We kind of drifted apart, right? -Yeah. He was in those smart classes.
translation.ko: 자연스레 멀어진 거고, 그렇지? 그래, 얜 똑똑이 반에 들어갔지

translation.en: I was in the other classes.
Hey, who's this guy?
-Anybody remember him? -Who is that?
-Wow, what happened to that kid? -He's still here.
translation.ko: 그 애는 어떻게 된 거야? 여기 있잖아

translation.en: Why do I know my new kid's gonna end up looking like that?
translation.ko: 우리 태어날 아기도 그렇게 생겼을 거 같은데

translation.en: -You're having a baby, Lenny? -Yeah, so I'm told, Mrs. Lamonsoff.
translation.ko: - 아이를 가졌니, 레니? - 네 네, 그렇다네요

translation.en: A surprise, huh?
Yes.
People today try to plan things out so much.
translation.ko: 요즘 사람들은 모든 걸 계획해서 하지

translation.en: But don't think an unexpected child is loved any less...
translation.ko: 예기치 않은 아이라고 계획해서 낳은 아이보다

translation.en: ...than one you planned for.
Someday, Lenny, you won't even remember what life was like with just three children.
translation.ko: 언젠가 아이 셋만 가졌을 때는 기억도 못 할 거다

translation.en: You think we wanted Eric?
-He was an accident. -Mama.
His father and I were in the men's room at a Patriots game....
translation.ko: 얘 아빠랑 내가 패트리어트 게임 때 화장실에서...

translation.en: You know what, I think I'm just gonna turn the page here. I'm turning the page.
translation.ko: 페이지를 넘기는 게 좋겠다 페이지 넘길게

translation.en: Finish the story!
Officer Dante is passed out on our lawn.
I know. I saw him trying to arrest an anthill.
Want to talk about the whole pregnancy thing?
translation.ko: 임신 얘기 하고 싶은 거 아니야?

translation.en: -It's okay. We'll talk tomorrow. -Okay.
Okay, you go to sleep. I'll make this between me and the baby.
translation.ko: 그래, 당신은 자 난 아기랑 할 얘기가 있어

translation.en: Hello in there. This is your daddy speaking.
I just want to tell you welcome to the family...
...and I love you very, very, very much.
I really don't care if you're a boy or girl.
I just need you to promise me one thing.
When you're in elementary school, study ballet...
translation.ko: 네가 초등학교에 가면 꼭 발레를 배우렴

translation.en: ...so I can see that teacher as much as possible.
translation.ko: 그래야지 내가 그 선생님을 자주 볼 수 있으니까

translation.en: -Hey. -I knew that was coming.
To be honest, I don't need no stinking ballet teacher.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말해서 아빤 발레 선생 따윈 필요 없단다

translation.en: I'm married to the most beautiful woman in the world, your mommy.
translation.ko: 아빤 세상에서 가장 아름다운 여자랑 결혼했거든 네 엄마 말이야

translation.en: Are you saying sweet things to me because you want to fool around?
translation.ko: 나 꼬시려고 그렇게 달콤한 얘기를 속삭이는 거야?

translation.en: That would be a nice way to kick off the summer.
Okay, Mr. Romantic.
But let's do this quick. We have a big day tomorrow, okay?
translation.ko: 하지만 빨리해야 해 내일은 바쁜 날이니까, 알겠지?

translation.en: Absolutely.
Watch your head in there.
Hang on. Hang on. I'm sorry, honey.
Don't move. Don't move. Oh, my God, I'm going to....
translation.ko: 꼼짝 마, 움직이지 마 세상에, 할 거 같아!

translation.en: I did it! I burpsnarted! Yes!
translation.ko: 했다! 내가 트림 방귀를 했어! 예스!

translation.en: Lenny, grow up!
I did it for the baby!
